FLOW AND SCRIPTING

Fixed a bug where ignoring Gale and his mirror image at camp would lead to his double hanging around in the morning. Saved some players who were stuck sleeping at camp. Fixed some repeating overhead dialogues across the game to reduce combat log and audio spam. Fixed Gale's body not moving at all while he delivers a line about Voss.
